§ 320101. Declaration of national policy It is declared that it is a national policy to preserve for public use historic sites, buildings, and objects of national significance for the inspiration and benefit of the people of the United States. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3257.)
